headline: Seoul-based Datumo raises $15.5M to take on Scale AI, backed by Salesforce
summary: Datumo began as an AI data labeling company and now wants to help businesses build safer AI with tools and data that enable testing, monitoring, and improving their models — without requiring technical expertise.

raw.headline: Seoul-based Datumo raises $15.5M to take on Scale AI, backed by Salesforce
raw.summary: Datumo began as an AI data labeling company and now wants to help businesses build safer AI with tools and data that enable testing, monitoring, and improving their models — without requiring technical expertise.

headline: Adobe Stock Gets a Downgrade. ‘AI Is Eating Software,’ Analyst Says.
summary: Adobe  stock was downgraded by a Melius Research analyst, who is concerned about what artificial intelligence competition means for the creative software company.  Ben Reitzes downgraded shares of  Adobe  to Sell from Hold and cut his price target to $310 from $400 on Monday.

headline: Melius Research warns that things ‘can get worse for SaaS players like Adobe’
summary: Investing.com -- Melius Research downgraded Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) to Sell in a note Monday, warning that the shift toward artificial intelligence is triggering “a multiple contraction phase in early innings” for leading SaaS companies.

headline: 2 Reasons to Watch VEEV and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: Veeva Systems has had an impressive run over the past six months as its shares have beaten the S&P 500 by 15.1%. The stock now trades at $282.13, marking a 20.4% gain. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
